sentence.Network_en: Mr Pearce was rather bowled over by his niceness, his concern and his ordinariness.
sentence.Network_cn: 皮尔斯先生简直为他的友善、关心和平民化惊呆了。

sentence.Network_en: Ordinariness is his norm; what is extraordinary tends to be suspect.
sentence.Network_cn: 他崇尚普通, 对非常之举心怀疑忌.

sentence.Network_en: Thus its very ordinariness posed the design challenge: to make something common into something special.
sentence.Network_cn: 因此,它很平凡构成的设计挑战: 为了使一些常见到相当特别.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 「初念」和事物的「平凡性」(ordinariness) 有何不同？有什麽方法可以真实了解「初念」与「平凡性」的关系？
...、边缘化Spiteful Tots成员的那种强调「平凡庸俗」(ordinariness)的同性恋主体的日常生活实践(何姿莹, 2008)。

auth_sentence.content: Its very ordinariness speaks volumes about this report.

auth_sentence.content: The ordinariness was there before Hodgson.
